S

saveSettings() - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.CursorManager
Save the configuration of the CursorManager that is currently in use.
scene - Variable in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.Cursor
 
SelectableBehavior - Class in org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d
This class defines a GVRBehavior that can be attached to a GVRSceneObject, it handles all the CursorEvents on the associated GVRSceneObject and maintains the correct SelectableBehavior.ObjectState based on the CursorEvents received.
SelectableBehavior(CursorManager) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.SelectableBehavior
Creates a SelectableBehavior to be attached to any GVRSceneObject.
SelectableBehavior(CursorManager, boolean) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.SelectableBehavior
Creates a SelectableBehavior which is to be attached to a GVRSceneObject with a specific hierarchy where, the attached GVRSceneObject has a separate child GVRSceneObject for each SelectableBehavior.ObjectState.
SelectableBehavior(CursorManager, SelectableBehavior.ObjectState[]) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.SelectableBehavior
Creates a SelectableBehavior which is to be attached to a GVRSceneObject with a specific hierarchy where, the GVRSceneObject to be attached has a root node at the top and a child for each of the states of the SelectableBehavior.
SelectableBehavior.ObjectState - Enum in org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d
Define all possible states the SelectableBehavior can be in
SelectableBehavior.StateChangedListener - Interface in org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d
Set a SelectableBehavior.StateChangedListener using SelectableBehavior.setStateChangedListener(StateChangedListener) to get updates about the change of the state of the SelectableBehavior
setBusyLoading(boolean) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.Cursor
Use this method to display a loading Cursor to the user.
setConnected(boolean) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.IoDevice
Use this from a subclass of IoDevice to indicate the connection status of the hardware associated with the IoDevice.
setCursorOnScreen(boolean) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.CursorManager
Use this method to ensure that the cursor remains within the bounds of the users frustum
setCursorTheme(CursorTheme) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.Cursor
Set a CursorTheme for this cursor.
setDepthOrderEnabled(boolean) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.CursorManager
CursorEvents can be grouped with other CursorEvents according to the depth of the GVRSceneObject that the event occurred on.
setEnable(boolean) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.Cursor
When enabled the Cursor would report CursorEvents.
setEnable(boolean) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.IoDevice
Sets the state of the IoDevice to value of enable.
setKeyEvent(KeyEvent) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.IoDevice
Call this from a subclass of the IoDevice to send a corresponding CursorEvent.
setPosition(float, float, float) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.Cursor
Set a new Cursor position if active and enabled.
setPosition(float, float, float) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.IoDevice
Use this method from the IoDevice subclass to set the position of the Cursor.
setRotation(float, float, float, float) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.IoDevice
Use this method from the IoDevice subclass to set the rotation of the Cursor in quaternion terms.
setScene(GVRScene) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.CursorManager
Use this method to set a GVRScene.
setSettingsMenuVisibility(Cursor, boolean) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.CursorManager
Use this method to show/hide the settings menu.
setSoundEnabled(boolean) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.CursorManager
By default the all sounds defined by the Cursor are played during interaction.
setStateChangedListener(SelectableBehavior.StateChangedListener) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.SelectableBehavior
Set the SelectableBehavior.StateChangedListener to be associated with the SelectableBehavior.
SettingsView - Class in org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.settings
 
SettingsView(GVRContext, GVRScene, CursorManager, int, Cursor, SettingsView.SettingsChangeListener) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.settings.SettingsView
 
SettingsView.CursorAdapter - Class in org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.settings
 
SettingsView.SettingsChangeListener - Interface in org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.settings
 
setVisible(boolean) - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.IoDevice
Use this method to turn on and off the visibility of the Cursor
